description.en: Everex enables you to transfer, borrow, and trade in any fiat currency, anywhere. No Bank account required. With settling times below 30 seconds, transaction costs of a few cents, and global support, the worldâ€™s markets are in the palm of your hand.

ico_data.short_desc: Decentralized app with peer to peer payments
ico_data.description: Creating a global, inclusive economy with Blockchain-powered micro-finance and remittance services. EVEREX is a young technology startup in the blockchain space with both a team and a business-model uniquely qualified to answer some of the challenges of international micro-financing.

status_updates.description:
On 28th March 2019, Rawin Boonyanusasna, Senior Executive Vice Presidentâ€Šâ€”â€ŠHead of Global Markets Group of Krungthai Bank, Alex Lane, CEO of EVX Holdings, and U Thein Zaw, Executive Vice Chairman of Shwe Rural & Urban Development Bank signed a Letter of Intent to introduce the 1st cross-border blockchain-powered money transfer services between Thailand and Myanmar. 
http://bit.ly/2OzZLdQ

"We look for ways to apply DFC, digital fiat currency tokens of non-cryptocurrency use cases such as cross-border money transfers and payments in currency exchange." â€” said Alexi Lane, CEO of Everex, at an interview with Women4blockchain http://bit.ly/2Fw28dy

Weâ€™re excited to share with you that Everex received approval from the United States - the State of NJ to onboard users and perform crypto-crypto domestic and international transactions ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸  http://bit.ly/2ut7mln

Check out our remarkable use cases of stablecoins and EVX for both individuals and SME's in the South-East Asia region, the U.S. and the EU: https://blog.everex.io/stablecoins-as-an-evolution-of-money-for-a-digitized-world-and-the-place-of-everex-in-it-8b2e22603600
